page.title: 07Stanedge Golf Course
page.content: The club was established in 1931 on farmland and covers an area of 50 acres.The course is surrounded by farmland, woodland and conifer plantations. The club is run by a committee elected annually. At present there are 230 gentlemen, 38 ladies and 22 Junior members. The oldest is 80 years old and the youngest 11. The course has 9 holes ,the most difficult is the 8th where the green is on a rise protected by bunkers and a large oak and pond provide natural hazards. The most popular time for playing is Sunday morning. Tournaments are organised for Sundays. Annual Subscriptions for 1984: Gents-playing member Â£80 O.A.P. Â£67 5-day member Â£53 Ladies-playing memberÂ£67 O.A.P. Â£53 Juniors Â£22
